snippet: The clampdown underlined the challenge ahead for Vladimir V. Putin as he reclaims the Russian presidency.
abstract: Vladimir V Putin officially reclaims Russian presidency as protesters continue to clash with riot police around Moscow; he faces a new generation of Russians with no recollection of the Soviet system that shaped Putin's worldview; they do not fear the state, and apparently are prepared to fight for power.

byline.original: By ELLEN BARRY and SOPHIA KISHKOVSKY
byline.contributor: Michael Schwirtz and Andrew Kramer contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The clampdown underlined the challenge ahead for Vladimir V. Putin as he reclaims the Russian presidency.

headline.seo: Vladimir Putin Returns to Presidency in Russia
headline.main: Putin Takes Helm as Police Punish Moscow Dissent
headline.print_headline: Putin Takes Helm As Police Punish Moscow Dissent
